item.title: midwife shortage costs over a million lives: report

item.title: prostate guideline causes many needless biopsies, study says
item.description: researchers said that recommending a biopsy for men whose p.s.a. rises rapidly does not help find aggressive cancers.

item.title: wisconsin group gets enough support to force recall vote

item.description: france's ban on full face veils, a first in europe, went into force on monday, making anyone wearing the muslim niqab or burqa in public liable to a fine of 150 euros ($216) or lessons in french citizenship.
